sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Man's chief end to glorifie God, or, Some brief sermon notes on I Cor. 10:31 by the reverend Mr. John Bailey. Bailey, John, 1644-1697.
[6], 160, 40, [3] p.
Printed by Samuel Green and are to be sold by Richard Wilkins, Boston : 1689.
"To my loving and dearly beloved Christian friends..." appears on its own at reel 2301:13, and is identified as Wing B449. Imperfect: Pages faded, stained, tightly bound and torn with some loss of print. Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the Congregational Library.. With: (at reel 1415:1) To my loving and dearly beloved Christian friends, in and about Lymerick. [Boston? : s.n., 1684?]
=======

[6], 160, 40, [3] p.
Printed by Samuel Green and are to be sold by Richard Wilkins, Boston : 1689.
"To my loving and dearly beloved Christian friends..." appears on its own at reel 2301:13, and is identified as Wing B449. Imperfect: Pages faded, stained, tightly bound and torn with some loss of print. Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the Congregational Library.. With: (at reel 1415:1) To my loving and dearly beloved Christian friends, in and about Lymerick. [Boston? : s.n., 1684?]
Richard Wilkins
Samuel Green
